name: DobbyxEscape: Halloween Adventure (itch)
description:
It is All Hallow's Eve and there's a magical party to attend!

When you arrive there, however, your witch friend needs your help!

Her party potion is far from ready and she needs the essence from five mystic locations!

It's up to you to help her out before time runs out and the party is a disaster!

Are you up for the challenge?

Features:
• A fun Room Escape game!
• Six locations to discover and explore!
• Beautiful graphics bring the game to life!
• Many items to collect and puzzles to solve!
• Fun soundtrack and sound effects!
